description: This file is a JavaScript source file defining a LightningJS application component named 'App'. It imports LightningJS modules and a page component, and sets up the application structure including layout, routing, and lifecycle hooks.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Lifecycle hook triggered when the application is mounted. Logs a message indicating the app is ready.

methods.name: afterRouteUpdate
methods.description: Hook called after the route has been updated. Logs the new route path.

calls: console.log('[App] Ready: application mounted and router initialized')
console.log('[App] Route updated to:', route && route.path ? route.path : route)
